oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Bailey, H. C., 1907 March 06
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript copy of an original will of H. C. Bailey, dated August 20, 1890, Weakley County, Tennessee. Certified by C. H. Hilliard, County court clerk for Weakley County, that “the above is a true copy of the will of H. C. Bailey, dec’d” on March 6th, 1907. Illustrates the first page of the document. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bailey family
